text:
The maximum principal amount of all short-term indebtedness outstanding and incurred under this Article, including any amounts outstanding under any credit facility, together with the outstanding principal amount of related revenue bonds, shall not at any time exceed the maximum principal amount of the applicable revenue bonds or other indebtedness approved by the voters or the Board, as the case may be. 
(Added by Ord. 12-00, File No. 992117, App. 2/11/2000; Ord. 270-06, File No. 061297, App. 10/31/2006)
